# Don't Allow Google agents to index mobile pages.
User-agent: Googlebot
Disallow: /m/
Disallow: /*/m/

# Do allow Google-Mobile agents to index mobile pages
User-agent: Googlebot-Mobile
Allow: /m/
Allow: /*/m/
